situation: D felt overwhelmed when transitioning from computer class to lunchtime and would often freeze, worrying about the crowds.
action: The teacher aide introduced a 'calm down' corner in the classroom with soft lighting and textures before moving. D practiced relaxation techniques here before transition and was allowed to carry a comfort item during the shift to lunch.
effect: By preparing in the calm down area, D was able to reduce her anxiety around transitions. Carrying her comfort item provided a sense of security, resulting in more successful transitions from computer class to lunch.
topic: Transition Difficulties - Moving between different activities or spaces
